nodes.text: Gurrecks were a species of predatory carnivores native to the forest moon of Endor. They had sharp fangs and tusks. The Ewok Teebo wore the skull of a Gurreck on his head despite the risks posed by the hat's fangs. Whenever the Ewoks managed to take down one such beast, they celebrated by throwing a feast, which usually included a special green gravy made with fresh Endorian herbs.
